FRNDFAM.title: FRNDFAM
FRNDFAM.description: While some people think that close relatives should be the most important people in one's life, others think that it should be close friends who are the most important. Which view is closer to your opinion? Please choose a number on a scale of 1 to 7 where 1 is "Close relatives should definitely be the most important", 4 is "Both should be equally important" and 7 is "Close friends should definitely be the most important".
enumDescriptions: 1 Close relatives should definitely be the most important
7 Close friends should definitely be the most important
